author: Mohamed Oumoumad
description: Convert any image to to the desired format, requires imagemagick, can be downloaded here : http://imagemagick.org/script/download.php make sure to enable legacy commands like (convert etc) while installing. You can also use ffmpeg instead

params.name: magick executer
params.tooltip: the path to your magick executable, if you already have it in your PATH environement variable, then just put 'magick', if left empty the one in libs/ will be used

params.name: Size
params.tooltip: input height and width (ex : 1920x1080), if left empty the source size will be used

params.name: Format
params.tooltip: choose the file format you want the solid color image to be

params.name: Quality
params.tooltip: 1 (lowest image quality and highest compression) to 100 (best quality but least effective compression).

params.name: Output name
params.tooltip: input the file name, if left empty the source name will be used

params.name: Output directory
params.tooltip: you can specify another directory, if left empty the file will be at the same directory as the source
